text.text_translated: I used to work a normal five-day week. I had some time off after having a baby. Then, I decided I wanted more time with my children before they go to school. I talked with my boss, and we agreed to make my work week shorter. Now I only work three days a week. Of course, this also meant a big cut in my pay. I am only paid for the days I work. However, I have noticed that my amount of work has not changed at all. I am now doing five days of work in only three days. But I'm getting paid much less for it.

feedback.feedback: PASS. The text is a perfect example of B1 writing. It uses simple sentence structures, appropriate B1 vocabulary, and accurately reflects the original text. The simplification of concepts like 'parental leave' and 'pro-rata basis' is executed flawlessly.
